data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Capa, María, Faroni-Perez, Larisse, Hutchings, Pat (2015): Sabellariidae from Lizard Island, Great Barrier Reef, including a new species of Lygdamis and notes on external morphology of the median organ. Zootaxa 4019 (1): 184-206, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4019.1.10
